mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO AS RE_NO, E.EMP_NAME AS RE_NAME, E.EMP_DEPTNO AS RE_DEPT, E.EMP_JOBCODE AS RE_RANK, E.EMP_ADDRESS AS RE_ADDRESS, R.HIRE_DATE AS RE_HIRE_DATE, R.RESIGN_DATE AS RE_RESIGN_DATE, R.TOTAL_WORK AS RE_TOTAL_WORK FROM EMP E , RESIGN R WHERE E.RESIGN_YN='Y' AND E.EMP_NO= R.RESIGN_NO;
